basics.name: Simon Chabrier
basics.label: Full Stack Application Developer Designer
basics.summary: Passionate Full Stack Developer, I design high-performance, secure and eco-friendly web applications while respecting accessibility standards and GDPR. Trained in Agility, I enjoy teamwork, knowledge sharing and taking on new business challenges while always respecting costs and deadlines. My code is systematically documented, tested and deployed continuously, with controlled management of technical debt and regular refactoring. Personally, I deploy and optimize my research projects on my home Ubuntu server to continuously refine my DevOps skills...

projects.name: Tendance Garonne
projects.description: Carried out as personal research, this short-term hydrological forecasting system covers the Garonne River and its tributaries. Nowcasting based on public Hub'Eau data with multi-station flood propagation.
highlights: Automated water level collection from 13 stations (Hub'Eau API)
Trend analysis via linear regression on a sliding window
Propagation delay estimation using cross-correlation
Multi-hop propagation: automatic upstream chain traversal when a station is unavailable
Forecasts at 1h, 2h, 3h and 6h with confidence index
Smart dampening of local trend based on upstream signals
Real-time interface via Mercure SSE with polling fallback
Canvas 2D charts: 24h history and projections
N8N orchestration (15 min cron), Python computation, vanilla JS display
Zero frontend framework, minimal and eco-friendly stack

projects.name: Edith Symfony CMS
projects.description: Developed within the company, Edith is a proprietary Symfony CMS whose development from scratch was entrusted to me. It enables the LibreSens agency to respond to its clients' specific needs with agility in a controlled and secure environment. Designed to be flexible and performant, Edith integrates advanced content management, administration and SEO optimization features, and complies with accessibility and GDPR standards.
highlights: Modular and extensible architecture for custom personalization
Fully configurable from the administration panel
Microservices for certain specific features
Complete documentation and automated tests
Custom pages, articles, events, FAQ
Reusable and customizable content blocks
Shortcodes integrable into any type of content
Hierarchical content organization with drag and drop
Content publishing with advanced media management
Single or multilingual (fr, es, en, de, it, nl…)
Complete URL translation
Advanced roles and permissions management
Compliance with accessibility and GDPR standards
Integrated SEO optimization
Optimized performance on client and server side
Partial content reloading for performance and eco-design
Reduced project development and maintenance time
